        <script><![CDATA[/**

Service-now.com
Description: Calculate the program actual cost from expense line, as Cost plan breakdown are not generated for Customers without Financials.
 **/

setProgramActualCost();

function setProgramActualCost() {
    try {
        //Skip data separation query BRs
        var isDataSeparationSkippedFromNowOnwards = typeof DataSeparatorGlobalUtil !== "undefined" ? DataSeparatorGlobalUtil.skipDataSeparation() : false;
        var task = current.source_id.getRefRecord();
        var primary_program;
        if (!task.instanceOf("pm_project") && !task.instanceOf("pm_program"))
            return;
        if (task.instanceOf("pm_project")) {

            /* if the prop is true and task is a parent project THEN continue ELSE return */
            if (!(gs.getProperty("glide.cost_mgmt.process_task_top_task") == "true" && task.parent.nil()))
                return;

            if (task.primary_program.nil())
                return;

            primary_program = task.primary_program;
        } else {
            primary_program = task.top_program;
        }

        var projects = new GlideRecord('pm_project');
        projects.addQuery("primary_program", primary_program);
        projects.addNullQuery('parent'); /* filtering only parent projects, to avoid duplicate actuals from sub projects */
        projects.query();
        var taskIds = [];
        taskIds.push(primary_program);
        while (projects.next()) {
            taskIds.push(projects.getValue("sys_id"));
        }
        var expTotal = 0;

        var exp = new GlideAggregate("fm_expense_line");
        exp.addQuery("task", "IN", taskIds.join(','));
        exp.addAggregate('SUM', 'amount');
        exp.groupBy('state');
        exp.addQuery("state", "processed");
        exp.query();

        var total = 0;
        while (exp.next()) {
            expTotal = exp.getAggregate('SUM', 'amount');
        }

        var program = primary_program.getRefRecord();
        program.work_cost = program.work_cost.getReferenceCurrencyCode() + ";" + expTotal;

        program.update();
    } finally {
        if (isDataSeparationSkippedFromNowOnwards)
            DataSeparatorGlobalUtil.honourDataSeparation();
    }

}]]></script>
